rules.text: You must speak in a different accent/voice every time your name is called
You must mimic whoever you choose, whether it be mockingly or straight up parroting
You are suddenly monolingual. What's English?
rules.description: You're not allowed to speak in English! Hope that helps! Reroll if that’s the only thing going for you I guess..

rules.text: Did you just get braces? Your lisp is going crazy!
You have to curse/swear in every sentence you speak.
rules.description: Mom wouldn’t be proud of the way you’re talking right now..

rules.text: Love is in the air! You are now a big flirt!
rules.description: No one is safe from cupid’s arrow, good thing you’re the one holding the bow!

rules.text: What's your name again? I can't seem to remember
rules.description: You’re not allowed to call people by their names! Be creative!

rules.text: You're so confused! Everything you say seems to be a question
You must repeat the last word you said in your sentence twice.
You are the proud owner of a Walkie Talkie! Begin each sentence with a "KSSH" and end it with an "OVER!"
You must only refer to yourself in the third person
You are now deaf/hard of hearing, poor you
You are banned from making eye contact with anyone
rules.description: You’re just a lil’ shy person aren’t you?

rules.text: You are infatuated with the first person you looked at after reading this, you are not allowed to look at anybody else
rules.description: To clarify, THEY ARE THE ONLY PERSON YOU ARE ALLOWED TO LOOK AT, NO ONE ELSE!

rules.text: What happened to your fingers? Oh no! You are now wearing invisible boxing gloves, either ask for help, or struggle
rules.description: Your hands are permanently in a fist shape, I wonder how you’ll ever do anything like that, oh well!

rules.text: You are now a Yes Man, "no" is not in your vocabulary
You have forgotten how to laugh normally, change up that giggle!
Start every sentence with “Uhh..”, “Um..”, “Erm..”, etc.
You can only speak when interrupting someone, how annoying!
Act like it’s the first time anyone has ever talked to you, you are over the moon
rules.description:
Embody the loser persona you’ve always kept hidden inside of you!
“OH! YOU’RE TALKING TO *ME*? OH MY GOSH I NEVER THOUGHT SOMEONE WOULD EVER TALK TO ME!”

rules.text: You are the best salesperson ever! Always end your sentence with an advertisement
rules.description: “Example sentence… And that’s why I LOVE RulerBreakers game made by the wonderful Drew & Aoof”

rules.text: Meow after anyone speaks
You never remember the rules of the game, keep asking about it
rules.description: “Hey so can someone explain the rules again? I wasn’t paying attention.”, “Wait, I’m so confused! How do you play?” , etc

rules.text: Try to mumble and slur your words in a conversation
rules.description: I feel bad for whoever was interested in whatever you were trying to say

rules.text: Suddenly raise your voice/yell a word in the middle of your sentence
rules.description: “Example sentence I am TALKING and then I suddenly YELLED, oh this is so SILLY of me!”

rules.text: Always walk backwards
Before you speak, you have to raise your hand
rules.description: Ahh the good ol’ school days, feeling nostalgic yet?

rules.text: You are deathly afraid of people, act accordingly!
rules.description: Flinch when someone speaks to you and jolt away when they get close to you

rules.text: The first person you look at after reading this is the most hilarious person ever, laugh at everything they say!
